inclusion.criterion: Patient with any form of shock on admission to ICU
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: patient looks ill with dry mucosa, blood pressure is 95/62 lying down and drops to 75/40 standing

exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: lab study: Sodium 137 meq/L, Potassium 2 meq/L, Chloride 94meq/L, CO2 15 meq/L

exclusion.criterion: Chronic liver failure( Child's B grade and above)
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patients who were already recruited for this study
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patients expected to die within next 48 hrs upon admission
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has V. cholerae in stool, but no fever and lab results are normal except for low potassium.
